arts.ttl: Inter Milan Midfielder Tops Serie A For Long-Range Goals: Level With Roma & Juventus Stars
arts.sum: Since arriving at Inter in 2021, Hakan Calhanoglu has established himself as one of the most dangerous long-range shooters in Serie A. arts.ttl: Inter Milan’s Tactical Plan For Roma: “Unpredictable Even Without Thuram”
arts.sum: As Cristian Chivu and his Inter Milan prepare to face Roma, La Gazzetta dello Sport broke down the tactical battle ahead – one that pits two evolving teams against each other. The paper noted, via FCInterNews, that while Chivu’s Inter are not a mirror of Inzaghi’s, Gasperini’s Roma are also still adapting to their coach’s […] The post Inter Milan’s Tactical Plan For Roma: “Unpredictable Even Without Thuram” appeared first on SempreInter.com.

arts.ttl: Inter Milan Without Three Players For Roma Clash As Argentina Star Returns & New Boy Set To Start
arts.sum: Inter will travel to the capital without Marcus Thuram, Matteo Darmian, and Filippo Di Gennaro for their Serie A clash against Roma. This comes as the Corriere dello Sport reports. Thuram remains out with a thigh injury, targeting a return against Napoli on October 25.
